title: BinderHub Launch Events
description: BinderHub emits this event whenever a new repo is launched

provider.description: Provider for the repository being launched

spec.description: Provider specification for the repo being launched. Usually, <reponame>/<commit-specification>

ref.description: Resolved reference for the repo at the time of launch

build_token.description: Whether a build token was used for the launch

origin.description: BinderHub host where the event originated
